text: Mamadou Papys Baldé (born 12 December 1985 in Velingara, Senegal) is a naturalized Equatoguinean football defender, who plays for the French side Langon-Castets.Joueur - MAMADOU BALDE - club de football LANGON CASTETS F.C. - Footeo ==Career== In October 2006, he left Legia Warszawa and came back to Senegal for some personal reason and he didn't come back for a long time. His first appearance after the break took place on 28 of November 2006 in the friendly game against Zagłębie Sosnowiec. ===International career=== In 2010, Mamadou accepted to be naturalized Equatoguinean by the Equatoguinean Football Federation and played for Equatorial Guinea a friendly match against Botswana on 12 October. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of Equatorial Guinea Category:Senegalese emigrants to Equatorial Guinea Category:Equatoguinean footballers Category:Equatorial Guinea youth international footballers Category:Equatorial Guinea international footballers Category:Senegalese footballers Category:Equatoguinean people of Senegalese descent Category:Equatoguinean expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:FC Girondins de Bordeaux players Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Legia Warsaw players Category:Clermont Foot players Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Association football central defenders Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mamadou Baldé
